title: Kick-Ass
writer: Jane Goldman (screenplay), Matthew Vaughn (screenplay), Mark Millar (comic book), John Romita Jr. (comic book)
actors: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Garrett M. Brown, Evan Peters, Deborah Twiss
plot: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.
